description:
Get into the holiday spirit with Xmas Bubbles — a cozy and cheerful game perfect for the festive season! Match colorful bubbles, clear sparkling boards, and enjoy relaxing, themed stages filled with lights, snow and holiday charm.

With simple controls, smooth gameplay, and dozens of joyful levels, Xmas Bubbles is a perfect pick for players of all ages. Sit back, relax, and let the winter magic pop!

Features:

Dozens of relaxing levels

Christmas visuals full of charm

Easy to pick up, perfect for all ages

Ideal for a short break or a cozy evening

Bring some holiday magic!
